type Page = class inherit FrameworkElement interface IAddChild

summary.span: 封装一页可由 Windows Internet Explorer、 和 导航到和承载的内容。

span.span: Encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated to and hosted by Windows Internet Explorer, , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封装可导航的内容页, 其中包含以下关键成员: encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated, and has the following key members: - **生存期管理**: 。**Lifetime Management**: . - **导航**: 。**Navigation**: . - **外观**: 、 、 、 、、 、和。 **Appearance**: , , , , , , , . - **宿主窗口外观**: 、 、 。**Host Window Appearance**: , , . 可以通过使用标记、标记和代码隐藏或代码来定义页。A page can be defined by using markup, markup and code-behind, or code. 页面是出于导航目的打包内容的首选方法, 原因如下:A page is the preferred way to package content for navigation, for the following reasons: - 它易于定义、重复使用和管理。It is easy to define, reuse, and manage. - 它可以访问和使用导航到它的。It can access and use the that navigated to it. - 它可以更改其主机窗口的标题、宽度、高度[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]和导航 (、 、 、 )。It can alter the title, width, height, and navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of its host window (, , , ). - 它在中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]具有设计器支持。It has designer support in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]. 可以从 、 、或从浏览器承载页面。A page can be hosted from , , , or from a browser. 若要承载, 页可以是:To be hosted, a page can be: - 中的、或元素的直接子级。[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]The direct child of a , , or element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. - 实例`Content`化并设置为、 和的属性的值。Instantiated and set as the value of the `Content` property of , , and . - 设置为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 或`Source` 的属性的源。Set as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] source of the `Source` property of either or . - 在独立的应用程序中设置为。Set as the in a standalone application. - 在中将设置为。 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] Set as the in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]. 应用程序通常有两个或多个页面, 可以使用以下机制在这些页面之间导航:An application typically has two or more pages, which can be navigated between using the following mechanisms: - 使用以声明方式。Declaratively by using . - 使用以编程方式。Programmatically by using . - 使用宿主导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]直观地进行, 包括[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]、 和。Visually by using the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the host, including [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], , and . 有关使用页函数 () 的结构化导航, 请参阅[结构化导航概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/structured-navigation-overview.md)和[导航拓扑概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-topologies-overview.md)。For structured navigation using page functions (), see [Structured Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/structured-navigation-overview.md) and [Navigation Topologies Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-topologies-overview.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性, 则当控件出现在应用程序中时, 属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用仅标记定义标准页:The following example shows how a standard page is defined using only markup: [!code-xaml[PageSnippets#MarkupPageMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupPage.xaml#markuppagemarkup)] 下面的示例演示如何使用代码仅定义标准页:The following example shows how a standard page is defined using only code: [!code-csharp[PageSnippets#CodePageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/CodePage.cs#codepagecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageSnippets#CodePageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/visualbasic/codepage.vb#codepagecodebehind)] 下面的示例演示如何使用标记和代码隐藏的组合定义标准页。The following example shows how a standard page is defined using a combination of markup and code-behind. [!code-xaml[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupAndCodeBehindPage.xaml#markupandcodebehindpagemarkup)] [!code-csharp[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupAndCodeBehindPage.xaml.cs#markupandcodebehindpagecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/visualbasic/markupandcodebehindpage.xaml.vb#markupandcodebehindpagecodebehind)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未保持活动状态 (请参阅), 则它需要实现一个无参数的构造函数[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] , 以便在导航到后退或前进导航历史记录时, 允许创建该实例的新实例。 If a is not being kept alive (see ), it needs to implement a parameterless constructor to allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to create a new instance of it when navigated to in back or forward navigation history.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepAlive { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.KeepAlive : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在导航历史记录中保留 实例。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance is retained in navigation history.

value.span: 如果在导航历史记录中保留 实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is retained in navigation history; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次导航到页面时, 会创建类的新实例。When a page is first navigated to, a new instance of the class is created. 导航离开页面时 ("后退" 或 "前进"), 会在导航历史记录中添加该页面的条目。When a page is navigated away from (either back or forward), an entry for the page is added to navigation history. 默认情况下, 该条目不引用 page 对象。By default, the entry does not reference the page object. 相反, 该项包含该页的包统一资源标识符 (URI)。Instead, the entry contains a pack uniform resource identifier (URI) for the page. 使用导航历史记录导航页面的条目时, 会使用 pack URI 来创建页面的新实例。When the entry for the page is navigated to using navigation history, the pack URI is used to create a new instance of the page. 此行为是默认行为, 以避免内存使用量过高: 保留页实例可以快速消耗内存, 尤其是那些具有重要内容的内容。This behavior is the default, to avoid excessive memory use: retaining page instances can quickly consume memory, particularly those with a nontrivial amount of content. 此问题的原因在于, 导航历史记录的后退和前进堆栈中可以存储的条目数没有限制。This problem is augmented by the fact that there is no limit to the number of entries that can be stored in the back and forward stacks of navigation history. 与此相反, 存储页面的包 Uri 几乎不会对内存消耗产生任何影响。In contrast, storing pack URIs for pages has virtually no impact on memory consumption. 创建页面的新实例的主要副作用是, 页面状态不会从页面的一个实例记录到另一个实例。The main side effect of creating new instances of a page is that page state is not remembered from one instance of a page to another. 在这些情况下, Windows Presentation Foundation 提供多种方法来记住状态。In these cases, Windows Presentation Foundation offers several techniques for remembering state. 若要使页面保持活动状态, 请将属性`true`设置为 (默认`false`值为)。To keep a page alive, you set the property to `true` (the default is `false`). > [!NOTE] > 仅使用代码 (例如, 调用) 来实例化并导航到的页面自动保持活动状态。Pages that are instantiated and navigated to using only code (for example, calling ), are automatically kept alive. 除非需要, 否则应`true`避免将设置为:You should avoid setting to `true` unless you need to: - 当页面包含大量内容时, 可能需要很长时间来实例化。When a page has a lot of content, it may take a long time to instantiate. 如果页面未保持活动状态, 并且经常导航到页面, 则持续实例化页面的成本可能会对用户体验产生负面影响。If the page is not kept alive, and the page is frequently navigated to, the cost of constantly instantiating the page may have a negative impact on the user experience. 但是, 从性能角度来看, 应依赖于默认设置并分析应用程序的性能;如果测试标识的页面的加载时间低于应用程序所需的范围, 则将页面配置为保持活动状态可能是解决问题的一种方法。However, from a performance perspective, you should rely on the default settings and profile your application's performance; if testing identifies pages with load times that fall below the range required for your application, configuring the pages to be kept alive may be one way to solve the problem. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]如果用户离开并返回[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]到, 则不会在的导航历史记录中保留处于活动状态的页的条目。Entries for pages that are kept alive are not retained in navigation history of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] if a user navigates away from and back to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]. 导航历史记录中只保留未保持活动状态的页的日记条目。Only journal entries for pages that are not kept alive are retained in navigation history. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖项属性的元数据类型为, 而不是。The metadata type on this dependency property is , not . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]在多个导航中保留类的实例。The following example shows how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] to retain an instance of the class across multiple navigations. [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAML1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexaml1)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAML2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexaml2)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAMLForLang1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexamlforlang1)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAMLForLang2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexamlforlang2)] [!code-csharp[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#setpagekeepalivecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#setpagekeepalivecodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NavigationService As NavigationService

summary.span: 获取页的宿主用来管理导航的导航服务。

span.span: Gets the navigation service that the host of the page is using to manage navigation.

value.span: 页的宿主用来管理导航的 对象；或者，如果宿主不支持导航，则为 。

span.span: The object that the host of the page is using to manage navigation, or if the host does not support navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面可由多种类型的主机 (包括 、 、和浏览器) 承载。Pages can be hosted by multiple types of hosts, including , , , and a browser. 页面通常需要与宿主的导航相集成, 以提供页面内导航支持。Pages often need to integrate with their host's navigation to provide in-page navigation support. 但是, 因为页可能不知道其在运行时的宿主, 所以它不能与宿主的导航成员直接集成以实现此目的。However, because a page may not know what its host will be at run time, it cannot integrate directly with its host's navigation members to do so. 相反, 它可以尝试使用导航服务, 该服务是一项支持浏览器样式导航并由类封装的服务。Instead, it can attempt to use a navigation service, which is a service that supports browser-style navigation and is encapsulated by the class. 不过, 您不能创建自己的实例。You cannot create your own instance, though. 相反, 主机类型 (如、 或) 会创建自己的实例, 您可以从属性访问该实例。Instead, host types such as , , or a browser create their own instance that you can access from the property. 从属性返回的导航服务是类的实例, 该实例由可视化树中的第一个导航器管理。The navigation service that is returned from the property is the instance of the class that is managed by the first navigator up the visual tree. 如果未找到, `null`则返回, 指示页的主机不支持导航。If one is not found, `null` is returned, indicating a page's host does not support navigation. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持导航, 也不提供导航服务。The class does not support navigation and does not provide a navigation service. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了页面如何检查导航服务是否可用, 如果是, 则使用它来导航回上一页。The following example shows how a page can check if a navigation service is available and, if so, use it to navigate back to the previous page. [!code-csharp[PageNavigationServiceSnippets#GetPageNavigationServiceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageNavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#getpagenavigationservicecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageNavigationServiceSnippets#GetPageNavigationServiceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageNavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#getpagenavigationservicecodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowsNavigationUI { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowsNavigationUI : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] 上的 的导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] is visible.

value.span: 如果宿主 的导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a host is visible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]下, 显示导航, 以启用浏览器样式向前和向后导航。 displays navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] by default to enable browser-style forwards and backwards navigation. 如果页面设置为, 则会自动打开以承载中的页面。If a page is set as the , automatically opens a to host the page in. 如果该页不想使用默认导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], 则可以将设置为`false`。If the page does not want to use the default navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], it can set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 由于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]不会与的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)]导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]集成, 因此它提供自己的导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], 可以通过设置来显示或隐藏它。Because [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] does not integrate with the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)], it provides its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], which can be shown or hidden by setting . [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]与[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]集成, 因此在中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]的页上设置不起作用。does integrate with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], so setting on pages in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] has no effect. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]隐藏的导航。 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] The following example shows how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] to hide the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a . [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAML1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixaml1)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAML2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixaml2)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAMLLang1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixamllang1)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAMLLang2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixamllang2)] [!code-csharp[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUICODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#setpageshowsnavigationuicodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUICODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#setpageshowsnavigationuicodebehind)]

exception.span: 在并非由 、 或浏览器承载的 实例上，将检查 属性。

span.span: The property is inspected on a instance that is not hosted by a , , or a browser.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的控件模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the control template for a .
The for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourceExtension**resourceExtension* 标识如何引用模板资源 ( `StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`) 的标记扩展。A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *styleResourceKey**styleResourceKey* 标识所请求模板选择器的键。The key that identifies the requested template selector. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的, 但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。For more information, see [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the .
The title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值不是由显示的, 它也不会显示在承载的窗口的标题栏中。The value of the property is not displayed by , nor is it displayed from the title bar of the window that is hosting a . 相反, 您可以将设置为更改主机窗口的标题。Instead, you set to change the title of a host window. 还可用于为一段导航内容生成导航历史记录项的名称。 can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content. 以下数据片段用于按优先级顺序自动构造导航历史记录项名称:The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 附加属性。The attached attribute. - 属性。The property. - 当前页的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]属性和。 The property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 当前页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page. 如果已将对象与导航历史记录中的一段内容相关联, 则可以通过重写来指定导航历史记录项中显示的名称。If you have associated a object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name that appears in the navigation history entry by overriding . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double WindowHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.WindowHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的宿主 或 的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接承载 的窗口的高度。

span.span: The height of a window that directly hosts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当由窗口直接承载时才应用, 其中包括: is only applied when a is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - - - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 如果由承载 , 则设置不起作用, 但仍可获取的值。 If a is hosted by a , setting has no effect, but you can still get the value of . [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 中的只能用来更改的高度; 无法通过设置、或更改高度。 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]A in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use to change the height of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the height cannot be changed by setting , , or . [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口的最小高度为150像素。The minimum height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window is 150 pixels. 对于浏览器承载的页, 这意味着, 如果其值会导致[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口的总高度小于150像素, 则不能应用该值。For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of may not be applied if it would cause the total height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 150 pixels. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从页面设置窗口的高度。The following example shows how to set the height of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowHeightPage.xaml#setpagewindowheightxaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ WindowTitle { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.WindowTitle : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的宿主 或 的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接承载 的窗口的标题。

span.span: The title of a window that directly hosts the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 承载页面的窗口的标题 (包括和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) 是当前正在承载的文件的名称 (如果页面松动[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], 则为 .xaml 扩展名; 如果页面是的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]一部分,则为xbap扩展名).By default, the title of a window that hosts a page, including and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], is the name of the file that is currently being hosted (with an .xaml extension if the page is loose [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], or an .xbap extension if the page is part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]). 页面可以通过设置其属性来更改默认值。A page can change the default by setting its property. 一旦页面以这种方式设置了窗口的标题, 窗口的标题就不会更改, 直到另一个页面集具有不同的值。Once a page sets the title of a window in this way, the window's title does not change until another page sets with a different value. > [!NOTE] > 必须是窗口中的最顶部内容段, 才能产生效果; 如果在中承载, 则设置不会更改主机窗口的标题。 The must be the topmost piece of content in a window for to have an effect; if a is hosted within a , for example, setting does not change the title of the host window. 还可用于为一段导航内容生成导航历史记录项的名称。 can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content. 以下数据片段用于按优先级顺序自动构造导航历史记录项名称:The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 附加属性。The attached attribute. - 属性。The property. - 当前页的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]属性和。 The property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 当前页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page. 如果已将对象与导航历史记录中的一段内容相关联, 则可以通过重写来指定导航历史记录元素的名称值。If you have associated a object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name value of a navigation history element by overriding . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从页面设置窗口的标题。The following example shows how to set the title of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowTitleXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowTitlePage.xaml#setpagewindowtitlexaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double WindowWidth { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.WindowWidth : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的宿主 或 的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接承载 的窗口的宽度。

span.span: The width of a window that directly hosts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当由窗口直接承载时才应用, 其中包括: is only applied when a is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - - - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 如果由承载 , 则设置不起作用, 但仍可获取的值。 If a is hosted by a , setting has no effect, but you can still get the value of . 中的仅[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 可用于更改的宽度; 宽度不能通过设置、或更改。 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]A in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use to change the width of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the width cannot be changed by setting , , or . [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口的最小宽度为250像素。The minimum width of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window is 250 pixels. 对于浏览器承载的页, 这意味着, 如果它将导致[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口的总宽度小于250像素, 则不会应用此值。For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of may not be applied if it would cause the total width of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 250 pixels. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从页面设置窗口的宽度。The following example shows how to set the width of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowWidthXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowWidthPage.xaml#setpagewindowwidthxaml)]
